name: book-api
description: I'm gonna make a book app in which i will link it to the book api. So that it will give return the book that user search for along with the link of the E-Commarce site to buy that book. In addition I will make it even more efficitent to search book by clicking the gener of the book. Hope this solo project will give me enough understanding and confidance to scale my career and establish me into realm of computer scienc.
author: amit singh
